LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Ballista.label: ballista
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Ballista.description: A large siege weapon originally developed by the Romans. fires a the equivalent of a massive 석궁 bolt. Must me manned.
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Ballista_Blueprint.label: ballista (청사진)
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Ballista_Frame.label: ballista (건설 중)
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Ballista_Frame.description: A large siege weapon originally developed by the Romans. fires a the equivalent of a massive 석궁 bolt. Must me manned.
LanguageData.Medieval_Catapult.label: 투석기
LanguageData.Medieval_Catapult.description: A 투석기 that launches explosive/incendiary shells. Must be manned.
LanguageData.Medieval_Catapult_Blueprint.label: 투석기 (청사진)
LanguageData.Medieval_Catapult_Frame.label: 투석기 (건설 중)
LanguageData.Medieval_Catapult_Frame.description: A 투석기 that launches explosive/incendiary shells. Must be manned.
LanguageData.Turret_Blaster.label: sentry blaster 터렛
LanguageData.Turret_Blaster.description: An AI-controlled 터렛 equipped with a charge blaster. Requires 1,200 W to function.\nCaliber: 6x24mmCharged
LanguageData.Turret_Blaster_Blueprint.label: sentry blaster 터렛 (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_Blaster_Blueprint_Install.label: sentry blaster 터렛 (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_Blaster_Frame.label: sentry blaster 터렛 (건설 중)
LanguageData.Turret_Blaster_Frame.description: An AI-controlled 터렛 equipped with a charge blaster. Requires 1,200 W to function.\nCaliber: 6x24mmCharged
LanguageData.Turret_Sniper.label: sentry laserbeam 터렛
LanguageData.Turret_Sniper.description: An AI-controlled highly calibrated gun 터렛 with advanced optics. This allows it to deliver a single but precise laserbeam at fairly long distances. Requires 1,500 W to function.\nCaliber: Charged laser beam
LanguageData.Turret_Sniper_Blueprint.label: sentry laserbeam 터렛 (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_Sniper_Blueprint_Install.label: sentry laserbeam 터렛 (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_Sniper_Frame.label: sentry laserbeam 터렛 (건설 중)
LanguageData.Turret_Sniper_Frame.description: An AI-controlled highly calibrated gun 터렛 with advanced optics. This allows it to deliver a single but precise laserbeam at fairly long distances. Requires 1,500 W to function.\nCaliber: Charged laser beam
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon.label: sentry heavy 터렛
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon.description: An AI-controlled plated automatic 터렛 with large caliber machine gun. Very resistant to damage. Requires 1,800 W to function.\nCaliber: 14.5x114mm
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon_Blueprint.label: sentry heavy 터렛 (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon_Frame.label: sentry heavy 터렛 (건설 중)
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon_Frame.description: An AI-controlled plated automatic 터렛 with large caliber machine gun. Very resistant to damage. Requires 1,800 W to function.\nCaliber: 14.5x114mm
LanguageData.NavalGunTurretGun.label: sentry naval 터렛
LanguageData.NavalGunTurretGun.description: An AI-controlled 35mm 자동포탑 터렛 automatically fires at enemies. It requires 2,200 W to function. It deals extra armor-piercing damage if the round has a direct hit. The 터렛 explodes when heavily damaged.\nCaliber: 30x173mm
LanguageData.NavalGunTurretGun_Blueprint.label: sentry naval 터렛 (청사진)
LanguageData.NavalGunTurretGun_Frame.label: sentry naval 터렛 (건설 중)
LanguageData.NavalGunTurretGun_Frame.description: An AI-controlled 35mm 자동포탑 터렛 automatically fires at enemies. It requires 2,200 W to function. It deals extra armor-piercing damage if the round has a direct hit. The 터렛 explodes when heavily damaged.\nCaliber: 30x173mm
LanguageData.Turret_SentryRocketLauncher.label: sentry 로켓 런처
LanguageData.Turret_SentryRocketLauncher.description: An AI-controlled sentry 터렛 with 로켓 런처. Requires 1,600 W to function.\nCaliber: AT 미사일
LanguageData.Turret_SentryRocketLauncher_Frame.label: sentry 로켓 런처 (건설 중)
LanguageData.Turret_SentryRocketLauncher_Frame.descri: An AI-controlled sentry 터렛 with 로켓 런처. Requires 1,600 W to function.\nCaliber: AT 미사일
LanguageData.Turret_M240B.label: 7.62x51mm M240B MG
LanguageData.Turret_M240B.description: M240B medium machine gun mounted on a tripod.
LanguageData.Turret_M240B_Blueprint.label: 7.62x51mm M240B MG (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_M240B_Blueprint_Install.label: 7.62x51mm M240B MG (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_M240B_Frame.label: 7.62x51mm M240B MG (건설 중)
LanguageData.Turret_M240B_Frame.description: M240B medium machine gun mounted on a tripod.
LanguageData.Turret_M2Browning.label: 50BMG M2 Browning MG
LanguageData.Turret_M2Browning.description: A manned, mounted M2 Browning Heavy Machine Gun. It uses .50 BMG Bullets for ammo and fires in a 15 점사.
LanguageData.Turret_M2Browning_Blueprint.label: 50BMG M2 Browning MG (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_M2Browning_Frame.label: 50BMG M2 Browning MG (건설 중)
LanguageData.Turret_M2Browning_Frame.description: A manned, mounted M2 Browning Heavy Machine Gun. It uses .50 BMG Bullets for ammo and fires in a 15 점사.
LanguageData.Turret_Minigun.label: M134 미니건
LanguageData.Turret_Minigun_Blueprint.label: M134 미니건 (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_Minigun_Blueprint_Install.label: M134 미니건 (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_Minigun_Frame.label: M134 미니건 (건설 중)
LanguageData.Turret_KPV.label: 14.5mm KPV MG
LanguageData.Turret_KPV.description: KPV heavy machine gun mounted on a tripod.
LanguageData.Turret_KPV_Blueprint.label: 14.5mm KPV MG (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_KPV_Blueprint_Install.label: 14.5mm KPV MG (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_KPV_Frame.label: 14.5mm KPV MG (건설 중)
LanguageData.Turret_KPV_Frame.description: KPV heavy machine gun mounted on a tripod.
LanguageData.Turret_ChainGun.label: 30mm GSh-30 cannon
LanguageData.Turret_ChainGun.description: A manned 터렛 mounted with a 30mm 자동포탑. It deals extra armor-piercing damage if the round has a direct hit. Converted for 30x165mm ammo. The 터렛 explodes when heavily damaged.
LanguageData.Turret_ChainGun_Blueprint.label: 30mm GSh-30 cannon (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_ChainGun_Blueprint_Install.label: 30mm GSh-30 cannon (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_ChainGun_Frame.label: 30mm GSh-30 cannon (건설 중)
LanguageData.Turret_ChainGun_Frame.description: A manned 터렛 mounted with a 30mm 자동포탑. It deals extra armor-piercing damage if the round has a direct hit. Converted for 30x165mm ammo. The 터렛 explodes when heavily damaged.
LanguageData.AvengerTurretGun.label: 35mm GAU-8 Avenger
LanguageData.AvengerTurretGun.description: A manned 터렛 mounted with a GAU-8 Avenger Fire Cannon that shoots at enemies. It deals extra armor-piercing damage if the round has a direct hit. It uses 30x173mm 탄약 for ammo. The 터렛 explodes when heavily damaged.
LanguageData.AvengerTurretGun_Blueprint.label: 35mm GAU-8 Avenger (청사진)
LanguageData.AvengerTurretGun_Blueprint_Install.label: 35mm GAU-8 Avenger (청사진)
LanguageData.AvengerTurretGun_Frame.label: 35mm GAU-8 Avenger (건설 중)
LanguageData.AvengerTurretGun_Frame.description: A manned 터렛 mounted with a GAU-8 Avenger Fire Cannon that shoots at enemies. It deals extra armor-piercing damage if the round has a direct hit. It uses 30x173mm 탄약 for ammo. The 터렛 explodes when heavily damaged.
LanguageData.Turret_Oerlikonautocannon.label: 20mm Oerlikon 자동포탑
LanguageData.Turret_Oerlikonautocannon.description: A manned 터렛 mounted with a 20mm Oerlikon 자동포탑. It deals armor-piercing damage. The 터렛 explodes when heavily damaged. It uses 20x102mm rounds for ammo.
LanguageData.Turret_Oerlikonautocannon_Frame.label: 20mm Oerlikon 자동포탑 (건설 중)
LanguageData.Turret_Oerlikonautocannon_Frame.descript: A manned 터렛 mounted with a 20mm Oerlikon 자동포탑. It deals armor-piercing damage. The 터렛 explodes when heavily damaged. It uses 20x102mm rounds for ammo.
LanguageData.Turret_VulcanCannon.label: 20mm Vulcan cannon
LanguageData.Turret_VulcanCannon.description: A fortified tower with a mounted 20mm Vulcan Cannon. It requires 800 W to function. It fires a quick, continuous stream of 20 bullets. Its high placement allows for a much longer range, but unfortunately due to that it can't aim directly down or close to itself and can't be placed indoors. It creates a sizable explosion when destroyed.
LanguageData.Turret_VulcanCannon_Blueprint.label: 20mm Vulcan cannon (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_VulcanCannon_Frame.label: 20mm Vulcan cannon (건설 중)
LanguageData.Turret_VulcanCannon_Frame.description: A fortified tower with a mounted 20mm Vulcan Cannon. It requires 800 W to function. It fires a quick, continuous stream of 20 bullets. Its high placement allows for a much longer range, but unfortunately due to that it can't aim directly down or close to itself and can't be placed indoors. It creates a sizable explosion when destroyed.
LanguageData.Turret_AGSThirty.label: AGS-17
LanguageData.Turret_AGSThirty_Blueprint.label: AGS-17 (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_AGSThirty_Blueprint_Install.label: AGS-17 (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_AGSThirty_Frame.label: AGS-17 (건설 중)
LanguageData.Turret_AGS30GrenadeLauncher.label: AGS-30
LanguageData.Turret_AGS30GrenadeLauncher.description: A manned 30mm Grenade Launcher mounted on a 터렛. It uses 30mmx6 GL 포탑 수류탄 for ammo. It fires a burst of 6 explosive 수류탄 over medium distances.
LanguageData.Turret_AGS30GrenadeLauncher_Frame.label: AGS-30 (건설 중)
LanguageData.Turret_AGS30GrenadeLauncher_Frame.descri: A manned 30mm Grenade Launcher mounted on a 터렛. It uses 30mmx6 GL 포탑 수류탄 for ammo. It fires a burst of 6 explosive 수류탄 over medium distances.
LanguageData.Turret_Flak.label: 90mm 대공포 터렛
LanguageData.Turret_Flak.description: Old school anti-aircraft cannon. Ineffective against modern aviation but still popular on rimworlds for use against entrenched enemies and vehicles.
LanguageData.Turret_Flak_Blueprint.label: 90mm 대공포 터렛 (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_Flak_Blueprint_Install.label: 90mm 대공포 터렛 (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_Flak_Frame.label: 90mm 대공포 터렛 (건설 중)
LanguageData.Turret_Flak_Frame.description: Old school anti-aircraft cannon. Ineffective against modern aviation but still popular on rimworlds for use against entrenched enemies and vehicles.
LanguageData.Turret_Cannon.label: 120mm tank cannon 터렛
LanguageData.Turret_Cannon.description: A 터렛 mounted with a 120mm tank gun. It can fire an explosive shell long distances, over walls and through constructed roofs. The 터렛 will explode when heavily damaged. It uses 120mm Cannon Shells for ammo.
LanguageData.Turret_Cannon_Blueprint.label: 120mm tank cannon 터렛 (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_Cannon_Blueprint_Install.label: 120mm tank cannon 터렛 (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_Cannon_Frame.label: 120mm tank cannon 터렛 (건설 중)
LanguageData.Turret_Cannon_Frame.description: A 터렛 mounted with a 120mm tank gun. It can fire an explosive shell long distances, over walls and through constructed roofs. The 터렛 will explode when heavily damaged. It uses 120mm Cannon Shells for ammo.
LanguageData.HowitzerTurretGun.label: 155mm 자주포 터렛
LanguageData.HowitzerTurretGun.description: A 터렛 mounted with a 155mm 자주포. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The 터렛 explodes when heavily damaged. It uses 155mm Howitzer Shells for ammo.
LanguageData.HowitzerTurretGun_Blueprint.label: 155mm 자주포 터렛 (청사진)
LanguageData.HowitzerTurretGun_Frame.label: 155mm 자주포 터렛 (건설 중)
LanguageData.HowitzerTurretGun_Frame.description: A 터렛 mounted with a 155mm 자주포. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The 터렛 explodes when heavily damaged. It uses 155mm Howitzer Shells for ammo.
LanguageData.Turret_TOWLauncher.label: BGM-71 TOW
LanguageData.Turret_TOWLauncher.description: The TOW ("Tube-launched, Optically-tracked, 와이어-guided") launcher is an anti-tank 미사일. First produced in 1970, the TOW is one of the most widely used anti-tank guided 미사일s.
LanguageData.Turret_TOWLauncher_Blueprint.label: BGM-71 TOW (청사진)
LanguageData.Turret_TOWLauncher_Frame.label: BGM-71 TOW (건설 중)
LanguageData.Turret_TOWLauncher_Frame.description: The TOW ("Tube-launched, Optically-tracked, 와이어-guided") launcher is an anti-tank 미사일. First produced in 1970, the TOW is one of the most widely used anti-tank guided 미사일s.
LanguageData.LightMissileSystem.label: MS FGM-148 Javelin
LanguageData.LightMissileSystem.description: The Light 미사일 시스템 fires 1 미사일 at a target area with each volley. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The 터렛 explodes when heavily damaged.
LanguageData.LightMissileSystem_Blueprint.label: MS FGM-148 Javelin (청사진)
LanguageData.LightMissileSystem_Frame.label: MS FGM-148 Javelin (건설 중)
LanguageData.LightMissileSystem_Frame.description: The Light 미사일 시스템 fires 1 미사일 at a target area with each volley. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The 터렛 explodes when heavily damaged.
LanguageData.MediumMissileSystem.label: medium 미사일 시스템
LanguageData.MediumMissileSystem.description: The Medium 미사일 시스템 fires 3 미사일s at a target area with each volley. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The 터렛 explodes when heavily damaged.
LanguageData.MediumMissileSystem_Blueprint.label: medium 미사일 시스템 (청사진)
LanguageData.MediumMissileSystem_Frame.label: medium 미사일 시스템 (건설 중)
LanguageData.MediumMissileSystem_Frame.description: The Medium 미사일 시스템 fires 3 미사일s at a target area with each volley. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The 터렛 explodes when heavily damaged.
LanguageData.RLGun.label: heavy 미사일 시스템
LanguageData.RLGun.description: The Heavy 미사일 시스템 fires 6 미사일s at a target area with each volley. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The 터렛 explodes when heavily damaged.
LanguageData.RLGun_Blueprint.label: heavy 미사일 시스템 (청사진)
LanguageData.RLGun_Blueprint_Install.label: heavy 미사일 시스템 (청사진)
LanguageData.RLGun_Frame.label: heavy 미사일 시스템 (건설 중)
LanguageData.RLGun_Frame.description: The Heavy 미사일 시스템 fires 6 미사일s at a target area with each volley. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The 터렛 explodes when heavily damaged.
